sentences.en: a hole punch
sentences.cn: 打孔器

sentences.en: a marketing team that beat all the competitors to the punch.
sentences.cn: 某销售组织先于其竞争者做出了重大行动

sentences.en: a painful punch in the solar plexus
sentences.cn: 胸口上挨的很疼的一拳

sentences.en: Everything was fine until someone threw a punch.
sentences.cn: 开头还好好的，后来不知是谁动了拳头。

sentences.en: He gave her a playful punch on the arm.
sentences.cn: 他开玩笑地捶了一下她的胳膊。

sentences.en: He made a speech with plenty of punch.
sentences.cn: 他作了一次有力的发言.

sentences.en: He managed to free one hand to ward off a punch.
sentences.cn: 他设法挣脱出一只手来挡住了一拳。

sentences.en: He punched me and knocked my teeth out.
sentences.cn: 他朝我一拳，打落了我的牙齿。

sentences.en: He was punch-drunk with fatigue and depressed by the rain.
sentences.cn: 他疲惫不堪，头昏沉沉的，因为下雨情绪也很低落。

sentences.en: If you say that again, I'll punch you in the nose!
sentences.cn: 如果你再那样说, 我就在你鼻子上捣一拳.

sentences.en: Make two holes with a hole punch.
sentences.cn: 用打孔器打两个孔。

sentences.en: Punch your credit card number into the keypad.
sentences.cn: 在小键盘上输入你的信用卡号。

sentences.en: The boxer gave his opponent a punch on the nose.
sentences.cn: 这个拳击手朝他对手的鼻子上猛击一拳.

sentences.en: The guard punched my ticket and I got on.
sentences.cn: 守卫在我的票上打孔后，我就上去了。

sentences.en: The guards, he said, would punch them for no reason.
sentences.cn: 他说警卫会无缘无故殴打他们。

sentences.en: Their work has all the usual punch, panache and flair you'd expect.
sentences.cn: 他们的作品一如既往地引人入胜、气韵潇洒、新颖别致，不会让你失望。

sentences.en: These bullets can punch a hole through 20 mm steel plate.
sentences.cn: 这些子弹可以穿透20毫米厚的钢板。

sentences.en: This kind of punch is easily operated.
sentences.cn: 这种冲床易于操作.

sentences.en: This machine can punch out 2000 coins a day.
sentences.cn: 这台机器一天能冲压出2000枚硬币.

sentences.en: This new sort of punch could stamp out 3,000 bonnets an hour.
sentences.cn: 这种新型冲床每小时可冲压出三千个汽车引擎盖。

sentences.en: W. Somerset Maugham's novel still packs an emotional punch.
sentences.cn: 威廉·萨默塞特·毛姆的小说仍具有强烈的情感冲击力。

phrases.tran_cn: 乐（或傲）如庞奇的；特别高兴（或骄傲）的；洋洋得意的，骄傲自满的
首先做出决定性的行动
果汁喷趣酒（清凉饮料）；水果混合饮料
连环出击；连续左右猛击；连续出击的组合拳
◎拳头凶猛有力，能击出有力的一拳
打卡：用记时钟在考勤卡上打印上班时间
(北美)（雇员）（用自动时钟）记录上（或下）班时间
&I{【俚语】} 从军用飞机上排出
(北美)（雇员）打卡记录上（或下）班时间

trans.tran_cn: 重拳击打，打孔机，冲床，影响力
trans.tran_en: a metal tool for cutting holes or for pushing something into a small hole

trans.tran_cn: 用拳猛击，（用压穿器）穿孔，冲孔，挤；按（键），压（按钮）
trans.tran_en: to criticize someone’s views, idea, plans etc by showing why they are wrong
to hit someone or something hard with your  fist (= closed hand )
